answers.answer: Dont worry huniIf u have to go down the c section route its not as bad as everyone makes out. If baby needs to come out its the best option and safest for u and baby. U have not failed in anyway by having a c section. Sounds like ur progressing, so relax and go with it. Take care all the best to u xxx

question: I'm 38 weeks & my blood pressure is high & have had bad head aches for a week now . I'm doing the 24 hr sample test & did blood workIf i do would they induce me? I'm 2-3 cm dilated & 80% effaced I want a vag delivery not a C section
title: Preeclampsia! :-(
